definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
uneven and jumbled (idiom); irregular and disorderly/in a tangled mess

sentences.english: Zhou Lan did well and made no serious mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 周兰做得很好，基本上没什么差错。

sentences.english: E1 error-free transmission device, called EFTD, is then developed for this purpose.
sentences.chinese: E1上的无差错传输设备就是为系统可靠性服务的。

sentences.english: The boy made many blunders as he stumbled through his recitation.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩在讷讷的背书中出了很多差错。

sentences.english: You will be responsible for any problem, because you do not listen to our well-intentioned words.
sentences.chinese: 我们好言相劝你偏不听，出什么差错你自己负责。

sentences.english: An anonymoustrader commented that the computer might have gone ahead and processed, something of an error happened there.
sentences.chinese: 一个匿名交易人说电脑可能出差错了。

sentences.english: The shop make a mistake and send the wrong item.
sentences.chinese: 商店出了差错而送错了货。

sentences.english: If you make a single mistake, he will pounce on you and say you're a fool.
sentences.chinese: 你要是出一点差错，他就会抓住机会说你是笨蛋。

sentences.english: She went through the typescript carefully to eliminate all errors from it.
sentences.chinese: 她仔细导语打字稿，以消除所有差错。

sentences.english: There's an accounting error in this entry.
Space communication has many distinctive characteristics, such as limited resources and high error rate.
sentences.chinese: 空间通信具有资源受限和差错率高等特点。

sentences.english: The boss rapped me on knuckles for failing to spot the mistake.
sentences.chinese: 老板因我不能找出差错而痛骂了我一顿。

sentences.english: Your task, as the coder, is to ensure that nothing goes wrong.
sentences.chinese: 作为编码人员，您的任务就是确保不出差错。
所有的新闻机构都会出差错。

sentences.english: Practice improved that the system used can increase the efficiency and reduce mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明这些系统的运用提高了效率，降低了差错率。

sentences.english: I think we'll be there on time if there are no delays on the way.
sentences.chinese: 我想如果路上没出什么差错的话，我们会准时到的。

sentences.english: You have made several mistakes this week.
sentences.chinese: 这周你已经出了好几次差错了。

definition: to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
to go wrong/to take a wrong turning
to dispose of a matter/to be done with it
to waste all one's previous efforts (idiom)/all that has been achieved goes down the drain
